project 1.title: Spending Calculator
project 1.desc: Made a script which scraps google pay export data and categorises my expenses. Can calculate average per month expenses, expenses year wise and export data to csv. Planning to implement some more

project 2.title: Transactional In-Memory KV Store
project 2.desc: Implmented a KV store in go which works based on transaction with rollback and commit options. Started off with this to learn on how to work with interface structs and LinkedList in go

project 3.title: Folder Organiser
project 3.desc: CLI which cleans up the folder by deleting duplicate files and moves the files into respective categories by creating folders
